entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 40
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 17
CALM WINDS, BECOMING NORTH 10 TO 15 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY CLOUDY AND COOLER
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 18
NORTH WINDS AROUND 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LIGHT SNOW ACCUMULATION POSSIBLE
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 6 ABOVE
NORTHEAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW 40 PERCENT
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 6 BELOW

SNOW SHOWERS
NEW MODERATE SNOW ACCUMULATION
COLD
HIGHS AROUND 15
LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE
CHANCE OF SNOW 80 PERCENT
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 5 BELOW

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS AROUND 20
CHANCE OF SNOW 30 PERCENT
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS ZERO IN THE MORNING

PARTLY CLOUDY

HIGHS AROUND 20
